channel.title: Wireshark on gateway?
channel.description:
Patrick et al
Gatrway 9.x has tshark pre-installed. I'm trying to install wireshark via package manager but getting error:...
[hr] W: Failed to fetch http://security.debian.org/pool/updates/main/w/wireshark/wireshark_1_...deb Temporary failure resolving 'security.debian.org' [hr]
But I was able to install it via "sudo apt-get install wireshark"!!!
ideas/suggestions/hints
On related subject...
When I run wireshark on gateway it reports there are no interfaces so nothing to capture. Yet, when I run tshark it shows packet transactions. What is tshark monitoring that wireshark cannot?
Thx

item.title: Wireshark on gateway?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
[quote=“mutsuura, post:1, topic:676”]W: Failed to fetch http://security.debian.org/pool/updates/main/w/wireshark/wireshark_1_...deb
Temporary failure resolving ‘security.debian.org’[/quote]
Probably just a temporary network failure.
Change circuit. (Using https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Arm#Arm or so.)
Then try again.

Read full topic

item.title: Wireshark on gateway?
item.dc:creator: mutsuura
item.description:
Patrick et al

Gatrway 9.x has tshark pre-installed. I’m trying to install wireshark via package manager but getting error:…

[hr]
W: Failed to fetch http://security.debian.org/pool/updates/main/w/wireshark/wireshark_1_...deb
Temporary failure resolving ‘security.debian.org’
[hr]

But I was able to install it via “sudo apt-get install wireshark”!!!

ideas/suggestions/hints

On related subject…

When I run wireshark on gateway it reports there are no interfaces so nothing to capture. Yet, when I run tshark it shows packet transactions. What is tshark monitoring that wireshark cannot?

Thx

Read full topic
